title: LeaverBuster

embed.title: League of Kledgends * /r/leagueoflegends
embed.description: Subreddit for content and discussion about League of Legends, a game created by Riot Games.

body:
I recently got an 5 games LeaverBuster because my WiFi did Crash because of an storm near my house.
I ask Mods/Riot members if you could undo this LeaverBuster because I didnt intentionally leave the game.
I know it's unfair to the other Players if that would happen but flaming and blaming me to "lose" the game on purpose isn't fair too.
I hope I get atleast and answer !
